games

Class GameOfLife

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.Game
      • games.GameOfLife
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GameOfLife
extends Game
implements java.util.Observer
    Implements Conway's "Game of Life" for use with the launchpad S
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion
